mapper.sql: id, user_id, coupon_id, title, target_money, discount_money, types, mobile, status, end_time, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: select a.id, a.user_id, a.coupon_id, b.title, b.target_money, b.discount_money, a.types, a.mobile, a.status, a.end_time, a.create_time, a.update_time from wemall_coupon_accept a, wemall_coupon b where a.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.coupon_id = b.coupon_id and b.status = 1

select a.id, a.user_id, a.coupon_id, b.title, b.target_money, b.discount_money, a.types, a.mobile, a.status, a.end_time, a.create_time, a.update_time from wemall_coupon_accept a, wemall_coupon b where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.coupon_id = b.coupon_id and b.status = 1 and a.status = 1
